languages.text: Блок пустотных щитов героически погибшего фрегата Дерзновение. Механизм был найден в обломках судна, вступившего в бой с силами Последнего восхода и ценой жизни уберегшего конвой шедших на Футфол транспортов с беженцами.

The void shield array of The Daring, a heroically destroyed frigate. The mechanism was found among the wreckage of the ship, which fought the forces of the Final Dawn and saved a convoy of refugee transports bound for Footfall at the cost of her own life.
languages.original_text: Блок пустотных щитов героически погибшего фрегата Дерзновение. Механизм был найден в обломках судна, вступившего в бой с силами Последнего восхода и ценой жизни уберегшего конвой шедших на Футфол транспортов с беженцами.

traits.locale_text: The void shield array of The Daring, a heroically lost frigate. The mechanism was found among the wreckage of the ship that fought the forces of the Final Dawn and saved a convoy of refugee transports bound for Footfall at the cost of her own life.

The void shield array of The Daring, a heroically destroyed frigate. The mechanism was found among the wreckage of the ship, which fought the forces of the Final Dawn and saved a convoy of refugee transports bound for Footfall at the cost of her own life.

languages.text: 护卫舰“勇气号”的虚空混沌阵列。这件装置是在“勇气号”的残骸中发现的，这艘护卫舰曾与“终末黎明”的部队勇猛交火，最终以自我牺牲为代价，拯救了一支前往落脚港的难民舰队。
languages.original_text: The void shield array of The Daring, a heroically destroyed frigate. The mechanism was found among the wreckage of the ship, which fought the forces of the Final Dawn and saved a convoy of refugee transports bound for Footfall at the cost of her own life.

traits.locale_text: 护卫舰“勇气号”的虚空混沌阵列。这件装置是在“勇气号”的残骸中发现的，这艘护卫舰曾与“终末黎明”的部队勇猛交火，最终以自我牺牲为代价，拯救了一支前往落脚港的难民舰队。

languages.text: 凛々しく破壊された護衛艦、ザ・デアリングのヴォイドシールド・アレイ。このメカニズムは、ファイナル・ドーンの軍勢と戦い、自らの命を犠牲にしてフットフォール行きの難民輸送船団を救った船の残骸の中から発見された。
languages.original_text: The void shield array of The Daring, a heroically destroyed frigate. The mechanism was found among the wreckage of the ship, which fought the forces of the Final Dawn and saved a convoy of refugee transports bound for Footfall at the cost of her own life.

traits.locale_text: 凛々しく破壊された護衛艦、ザ・デアリングのヴォイドシールド・アレイ。このメカニズムは、ファイナル・ドーンの軍勢と戦い、自らの命を犠牲にしてフットフォール行きの難民輸送船団を救った船の残骸の中から発見された。

languages.text: El escudo de vacío de la Audaz, una fragata que sufrió una destrucción heroica. El mecanismo fue encontrado entre los restos de la nave, que se enfrentó a las fuerzas del Amanecer Final y salvó un convoy de transportes de refugiados destinados a Paso a costa de su propia vida.
languages.original_text: The void shield array of The Daring, a heroically destroyed frigate. The mechanism was found among the wreckage of the ship, which fought the forces of the Final Dawn and saved a convoy of refugee transports bound for Footfall at the cost of her own life.

traits.locale_text: El escudo de vacío de la Audaz, una fragata que sufrió una destrucción heroica. El mecanismo fue encontrado entre los restos de la nave, que se enfrentó a las fuerzas del Amanecer Final y salvó un convoy de transportes de refugiados destinados a Paso a costa de su propia vida.

languages.text: Composant du bouclier du vide de la frégate l'Intrépide détruite au cours d'un combat héroïque. Ce mécanisme a été récupéré à bord de l'épave du vaisseau ayant affronté les forces de l'Aube finale et s'étant sacrifié pour sauver un convoi de réfugiés faisant route vers Castel.
languages.original_text: The void shield array of The Daring, a heroically destroyed frigate. The mechanism was found among the wreckage of the ship, which fought the forces of the Final Dawn and saved a convoy of refugee transports bound for Footfall at the cost of her own life.

traits.locale_text: Composant du bouclier du vide de la frégate l'Intrépide détruite au cours d'un combat héroïque. Ce mécanisme a été récupéré à bord de l'épave du vaisseau ayant affronté les forces de l'Aube finale et s'étant sacrifié pour sauver un convoi de réfugiés faisant route vers Castel.

languages.text: Der Deflektorschild der The Daring, einer heldenhaft zerstörten Fregatte. Der Mechanismus wurde im Wrack des Schiffs gefunden, das gegen die Truppen der Letzten Dämmerung kämpfte und einen Konvoi von Flüchtlingstransportern nach Footfall rettete, dabei aber selbst unterging.
languages.original_text: The void shield array of The Daring, a heroically destroyed frigate. The mechanism was found among the wreckage of the ship, which fought the forces of the Final Dawn and saved a convoy of refugee transports bound for Footfall at the cost of her own life.

traits.locale_text: Der Deflektorschild der The Daring, einer heldenhaft zerstörten Fregatte. Der Mechanismus wurde im Wrack des Schiffs gefunden, das gegen die Truppen der Letzten Dämmerung kämpfte und einen Konvoi von Flüchtlingstransportern nach Footfall rettete, dabei aber selbst unterging.

languages.text: Kahramanca çarpışarak imha olan fırkateyn Yürekli'nin uçsuz kalkanı dizilimi. Mekanizma, Nihai Şafak güçleriyle savaşan ve mülteci nakliye gemilerinden oluşan bir kafileyi kendi canı pahasına koruyan geminin enkazında bulunmuştur.
languages.original_text: The void shield array of The Daring, a heroically destroyed frigate. The mechanism was found among the wreckage of the ship, which fought the forces of the Final Dawn and saved a convoy of refugee transports bound for Footfall at the cost of her own life.
